name: Aroundme Network
tag_list: social-netwoking, neighborhood, local, reviews, merchants, local-events, classifieds, deals, business-listings
overview:
AroundMe intends to let people build community networks based on their location (as specific as zipcode) and desired radius of area.

Individuals can find or publish events, form groups, find classifieds, reviews, coupons and ask around in the neighborhood. Local merchants can participate in the same social activities along side of residents allowing them to understand their customer base first hand. Merchants can also publish business info, allow business review and best of all they can create and publish coupons themselves very easily.

Users can share and recommend items of interest with people in their networks thus making information flow among trusted sources.

Aroundme Network intends to build the network for people to interact and benefit from each other in a very local social setting.
